metadata.description: Enterprise web application specification, build, and test pipeline — 19-step design process producing a complete /spec folder, plus companion skills for building and BDD-testing the resulting application.

plugins.name: webapp-blueprint
plugins.description: Comprehensive enterprise web application specification pipeline. Guides users through 19 sequential design steps — from domain discovery, role matrices, and design systems through BDD features, page specs, component contracts, API definitions, authorization policies, seed data, and blackbox test templates. Produces a complete /spec folder and suite test template ready for code generation. See also: webapp-blueprint-build (implement + fix cycle) and webapp-blueprint-test (BDD scenario execution).

plugins.name: webapp-blueprint-build
plugins.description: Build, test, fix, and spec-sync cycle for webapp-blueprint suites. Guides the build agent through deploying from generation briefs, coordinating the test agent, fixing BDD failures sequentially, and syncing spec gaps back to the blueprint.

plugins.name: webapp-blueprint-test
plugins.description: Blackbox BDD test execution for webapp-blueprint suites. Reads the suite test template and manifest, runs every scenario against the deployed app, and writes results for the build agent to consume. Run in a completely separate Claude Code session from the build agent.
